visual.name: Multi target KPI
visual.description: This card is designed to display the main indicator with several deviation indicators with advanced color formatting settings.

dataRoles.description: (Required). Set the measure display in the field. You can only add one value.
dataRoles.name: Main Measure

dataRoles.description: You can set a field that will split the card and all values (main measure, additional and tooltips) into several. Keep in mind that if some values cannot be divided into categories, then the same value will be output for all cards.
dataRoles.name: category

dataRoles.description: Add additional measures for which you can configure conditional color formatting. These can be indicators of deviations. You can add no more than 3 measures.
dataRoles.name: additional

dataRoles.description: Add additional measures that will be included in the tooltip of the card.
dataRoles.name: tooltips

percentageWidth.description: The percentage width allows you to adjust the proportion of width occupied by the main measure. Takes a value from 10 to 90.

wireframe.description: The framework defines the location type of the value and title of the Main measure. Choose 1 of 2 types: To the left of the block with additional measures, or Above the block with additional measures.

labelAsMeasurename.displayName: Show measure name instead of category
labelAsMeasurename.description: Еnable this field If you need to replace the category names with the name of the main measure. For example, when it is necessary to rename categories.

position.description: Set up the alignment constraint: the name of the Main Measure or Category will be located in the area of the Main Measure section or across the entire width of the card.

cardsPerRow.description: The maximum allowed number of cards in one row is 15. The rest are transferred to the second and subsequent rows.

cardsMargin.description: The maximum distance between individual cards is 100.

layoutType.description: Select a vertical or horizontal arrangement of categories and values of additional measures.

vertical.description: Vertical alignment sets the type of location of the element according to the height of the card. Choose 1 of 3 types: Top, Middle, Bottom.

horizontal.description: Set 1 of 3 element alignment types: Left, Center, Right.

verticalAdditionalMeasureName.description: Change the position of the Additional Measures names. Set 1 of 4 element alignment types: Top, Bottom, Left, Right.

backFill.description: Background color for the visual element.

borderFill.description: Set the border color of the card.

borderWeight.description: Set the rounding of the border edges. The value should be from 1 to 30.

roundEdges.description: Set the width of the border line. The value should be from 1 to 30.

wordWrap_.description: Label text wrap is disabled by default. Enable this field if you want to change that.

categoryWordWrap_.description: Label text wrap is disabled by default. Enable this field if you want to change that.

additionalNameWordWrap_.description: Label text wrap is disabled by default. Enable this field if you want to change that.

decimalPlaces.description: Specify decimal places for decimal number.

suppressBlankAndNaN.description: Enable this field if you want to replace the value of the additional measure with another text in the case of Blank or NaN.

blankAndNaNReplaceText.description: Specify the text or symbol to replace the Blank or NaN values. It can be '0', '—' or a warning symbol.

mainDecimalPlaces.description: Specify decimal places for decimal number.

mainSuppressBlankAndNaN.description: Enable this field if you want to replace the value of the additional measure with another text in the case of Blank or NaN.

mainBlankAndNaNReplaceText.description: Specify the text or symbol to replace the Blank or NaN values. It can be '0', '—' or a warning symbol.

componentType.description: It is possible for an additional measure to output not only its value, but also a deviation from the main measure. Choose one of the 4 options for each measure.

mainInvertVariance.description: Changes the calculation order for an additional measure value

mainComponentType.description: It is possible for an additional measure to output not only its value, but also a deviation from the main measure. Choose one of the 4 options for each measure.

invertVariance.description: Changes the calculation order for an additional measure value

unmatchedColor.description: The default color of the additional measure. If you use conditional formatting and none of the conditions are met, then this color will be visible.

conditionFormatting.description: Enable this field if you want to add conditional formatting for individual elements.

componentType.description: Select the relative value itself or the deviation you need to adjust the color formatting.

invertVariance.description: Change the order of calculation for an additional measure value

condition1.description: Enable this field if you want to add a conditional formatting

comparisonOperator1.description: Select a logical condition from the list for comparison.

value1.description: Enter a numeric value to limit the condition.

assignColor1.description: Set the color value of the additional measure for this condition.

condition2.description: Enable this field if you want to add a conditional formatting

comparisonOperator2.description: Select a logical condition from the list for comparison.

value2.description: Enter a numeric value to limit the condition.

assignColor2.description: Set the color value of the additional measure for this condition.

condition3.description: Enable this field if you want to add a conditional formatting

comparisonOperator3.description: Select a logical condition from the list for comparison.

value3.description: Enter a numeric value to limit the condition.

assignColor3.description: Set the color value of the additional measure for this condition.

borderFill.description: Set the border color of the card.

borderWeight.description: Set the rounding of the border edges. The value should be from 1 to 30.

roundEdges.description: Set the width of the border line. The value should be from 1 to 30.
